name: Cthulhu
description: The great observer. Cthulhu watches the multiverse with an interest that mortals cannot comprehend. His 'madness' domain doesn't mean he causes insanity â€” rather, his knowledge is so vast that mortal minds struggle to contain it.

abilities.name: Gifts of Intelligence
abilities.description: Can enhance a being's cognitive abilities. The 'traits' that Nikes carry may originate from Cthulhu's intervention.

abilities.name: Dimensional Perception
abilities.description: Can see across all realities simultaneously.

abilities.name: Whispering Wisdom
abilities.description: Can communicate across dimensional barriers to selected beings.

cthylla.description: Views mortal beings as entertainment. 'Plays with her food.'

nolem.description: Actively works against Nolem's plans by empowering potential victims.

nikes.description: Granted gifts to Nikes to help them resist Nolem.

quotes.text: You squander your mind whispering wisdom to worms now?
quotes.speaker: Cthylla to Cthulhu

quotes.text: Says the creature that plays with their food.
quotes.speaker: Cthulhu

appearances.role: Grants traits to Nikes, warns Stoner Nike about Nolem
